com.samsung.spensdk.applistener

Interface SettingViewShowListener


  • public interface SettingViewShowListener
    The S-Canvas based Callback Listener Interface about the Events of Setting Views
    Since:
    S-Pen SDK 2.1

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onEraserSettingViewShow(boolean bVisible)
      This handler is called when the eraser setting view is shown or closed
      void onFillingSettingViewShow(boolean bVisible)
      This handler is called when closing or opening the Filling Settings pop-up.
      void onPenSettingViewShow(boolean bVisible)
      This handler is called when the pen setting view is shown or closed
      void onTextSettingViewShow(boolean bVisible)
      This handler is called when the text setting view is shown or closed

    • Method Detail

      • onPenSettingViewShow

        void onPenSettingViewShow(boolean bVisible)
        This handler is called when the pen setting view is shown or closed
        Parameters:
        bVisible - visible state of pen setting view
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • onEraserSettingViewShow

        void onEraserSettingViewShow(boolean bVisible)
        This handler is called when the eraser setting view is shown or closed
        Parameters:
        bVisible - visible state of eraser setting view
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • onTextSettingViewShow

        void onTextSettingViewShow(boolean bVisible)
        This handler is called when the text setting view is shown or closed
        Parameters:
        bVisible - visible state of text setting view
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • onFillingSettingViewShow

        void onFillingSettingViewShow(boolean bVisible)
        This handler is called when closing or opening the Filling Settings pop-up.
        Parameters:
        bVisible - True if the pop-up is opening, and False if the pop-up is closing
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2
